body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet that states it can only be used ‘once per battle’.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that model has the CHARACTER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is treated as having 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
body.effect: If your unit is a HALO OVERRIDE unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. Select one Override ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, that ability is active for your unit.Designer’s Note: This means that if the targeted unit already has the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it can be affected by multiple Override abilities at the same time, but suffers mortal wounds to do so. Alternatively, if your unit does not have the HALO OVERRIDE keyword, it instead has the chosen Override ability until the start of your next Command phase, but does not benefit from any other Override abilities that are active.

body.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and is in Strategic Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but if it does, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. In addition, if your unit is a TRANSPORT, each unit that disembarks from it this turn must be set up more than 6" horizontally from all enemy units and until the end of the turn, is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, at the end of your turn, select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIAN DEFENDERS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIAN DEFENDERS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.

body.effect: До конца фазы, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified бросок попадания of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase and is wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from that enemy unit.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within 9" of and visible to your unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. If that enemy unit suffers one or more mortal wounds in this way, your unit can then make a Normal move of up to D6”.
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot fire Overwatch.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed, and each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there.

body.when: Your Movement phase.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an AELDARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
body.target: That AELDARI unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3" and, if it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units that are visible to it (and in Unit Coherency), it can still make that Consolidation move, and when doing so can move in any direction.

body.when: В вашу фазу стрельбы.

body.effect: До конца фазы, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. Кроме того, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the бросок попадания.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway that is visible to and within range of one or more of the ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. Open that Hatchway and, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
body.restriction: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to shoot.

body.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is in Reserves and has the Deep Strike ability.

body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Then, your unit suffers 3D3 mortal wounds.

body.target: One REGIMENT INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.target: One ASTRA MILITARUM unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, if all of its models have the Deep Strike ability, or one VALKYRIE unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Any phase.

body.restriction: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly INFANTRY REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

body.when: Начало your фазу команд.
body.target: One ПЕХОТА OFFICER model from your army.
body.effect: До конца фазы, when your model issues the Move! Move! Move! Order, it can issue that Order to any number of eligible friendly ПЕХОТА REGIMENT units, regardless of range to your model.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit while targeting an enemy unit within half range.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.

body.when: В вашу фазу стрельбы.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit ends a Charge move within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Начало your opponent’s фазу атаки.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time an вражеское подразделение ends a Charge move within дистанция ближнего боя of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that вражеское подразделение: for each 5+, that вражеское подразделение suffers 1 смертельная рана (to a maximum of 6 смертельная ранаs).

body.when: Начало your opponent’s фазу атаки.
body.target: One PLATOON unit from your army.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time an вражеское подразделение ends a Charge move within дистанция ближнего боя of your unit, roll one D6 for each model in that вражеское подразделение: for each 5+, that вражеское подразделение suffers 1 смертельная рана (to a maximum of 6 смертельная ранаs).

body.target: That MILITARUM TEMPESTUS unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from the Move characteristic of models in that enemy unit, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, OFFICER models from your army cannot issue Orders. You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.restriction: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Start of any Command phase.
body.target: One INQUISITOR, INQUISITORIAL AGENTS or ORDO MALLEUS unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Warded and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Warded and under your control, enemy DAEMON units cannot be set up on the battlefield within 6" of it.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Start or end of any turn, when an enemy unit attempts to Seize an objective marker you have Secured.

body.effect: Select one вражеское подразделение that had one or more models destroyed as a result of those attacks. That вражеское подразделение must take a тест боевого шока.

body.when: Your Command phase.

body.when: Any phase.

In addition, any enemy units that suffer mortal wounds as a result of this Stratagem are Afflicted until the start of your next turn.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.

body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

body.when: Your Command phase.

If that objective marker does not have any enemy models within range of it (excluding Battle-shocked models), your unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result if that objective marker is Secured by your opponent’s army. If that test is passed, that objective marker is no longer considered Secured by your opponent’s army and is Secured by your army.

body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of those WAR DOG units. Until the end of the phase, models in those WAR DOG units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of those WAR DOG units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Start of the Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One WAR DOG CHARACTER unit from your army.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. Each friendly WAR DOG unit that is within 6" of your unit and is Battle-shocked must take a Leadership test; if that test is passed, that unit is no longer Battle-shocked.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

body.when: Начало the фазу стрельбы or the start of the фазу боя.

body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

cards.title: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Start of the Command phase.

body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ANCIENT model from your army is destroyed.

body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

body.when: Any phase.

body.restriction: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed CHARACTER units to Attached units. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". In addition, when making a Consolidation move, that model can end that move within Engagement Range of the closest enemy unit that was not visible to its unit when it started that move.

body.when: фазу боя.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a KROOTOX RIDERS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.

body.when: Any phase.

body.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One RUBRIC MARINES or SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit from your army that is in Strategic Reserves.
body.effect: If it is a RUBRIC MARINES unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, if it is a SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATOR unit it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within your army’s Flow of Magic and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
body.restriction: If a SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit is targeted with this Stratagem, it is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One GENESTEALERS or PURESTRAIN GENESTEALERS unit from your army that is wholly within an Entry Zone.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase. When doing so, if it was within one of your Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your Entry Zones. If it was within one of your opponent’s Entry Zones when it was removed, it must be set up wholly within another one of your opponent’s Entry Zones instead. If this is not possible, your unit is destroyed.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is visible to your unit and within Engagement Range of one or more friendly ENDLESS MULTITUDE or RIPPER SWARMS units. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to make ranged attacks against that enemy unit as if it was not within Engagement Range of those friendly units. When doing so, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and, after your unit has finished making its attacks, each of those friendly units that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One TYRANID WARRIORS WITH MELEE BIO-WEAPONS or TYRANID WARRIORS WITH RANGED BIO-WEAPONS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed as a result of an attack, do not remove it from play; after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, roll one D6: on a 3-5, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, the closest enemy unit within 3" of and visible to your unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. The destroyed model is then removed from play.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
body.restriction: Any destroyed CHARACTER units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: Любая фаза.

body.restriction: Any destroyed ПЕРСОНАЖ units that were attached to your unit are not returned. You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: Any phase, just before an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.
body.target: That ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit.
body.effect: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit]. All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.

body.target: One WORLD EATERS unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy models with a melee attack this phase.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if your unit is a VESSEL OF WRATH unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.
